title: Error
description:
An *error* contains information about the status code (in HTTP semantics), error identifier and message.
Optionally a description and a link how to solve the error may be provided.

status.title: Error status
status.description: The HTTP status code of the error (e.g.: 4xx for user errors, 5xx for server errors).

error.title: Error code
error.description: The error code or identifier of the occurred error.

message.title: Error message
message.description: The message of the error - what went wrong.

description.title: Error description
description.description: A description how to fix the error or more details.

href.title: Error link
href.description: A link to further information about the error and how to fix it.
